channel.title: Delta questions
channel.description:
1. Does anyone have a Dragon Claws special attack adding tutorial?
2. How do I make only rune bolts hit higher?
3. I removed the special attack bar from my weapon? (I removed it but when you log out then in with it the bar comes back.)

item.title: Delta questions
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

I did, But when you log out then in the bar comes back.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta questions
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You remove it from your special class, not your special.class.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta questions
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

[code]1. Fine…
2. I’ll check that
3. From my Client class but not my Client.Class do I have to from the .Class?

setAnimation(GetWepAnim(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
if(UseCrossBow && misc.random(5)==1 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 881){
hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit2()) + misc.random(30);
stillgfx(197, EnemyY, EnemyX);
actionInterval = getbattleTimer();
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
}[/code]

What do I change to change the max, also the emote? (It shows up as black fire under a person.)

Read full topic

item.title: Delta questions
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

  1. Use Google.
  2. Client class.
public int maxRangeHit()
  1. Did you remove both from your special class?
